CORE_CONTENT.confidence_score: Chain confidence score; ≥0.91 stable, 0.80–0.90 warning, <0.80 triggers POST_MORTEM.
CORE_CONTENT.variance_delta: Deviation from harmonic equilibrium; ≤0.05 acceptable, >0.05 requires FRACTAL realignment.

telemetry_header.description: Live telemetry log capturing recursive harmonics, bias entropy, drift variance, and coherence alignment for the Tier-9 Quantum Meta-Synthesis Core.

fields.timestamp_utc: ISO8601 (UTC) — The precise time of telemetry capture.
fields.cycle_id: UUID — Unique identifier for the meta-synthesis cycle.
fields.node_id: UUID — Identifier of the active Tier-9 quantum node.
fields.fusion_alignment: float (0.0–1.0) — Weighted alignment of harmonic fields across triads.
fields.harmonic_index: float (0.0–1.0) — Global harmonic coherence level at this cycle.
fields.coherence_index: float (0.0–1.0) — Systemic stability between recursion states.
fields.bias_entropy: float (0.0–1.0) — Entropy of contextual bias weighting (lower is more stable).
fields.bias_alignment_vector: string — Direction of dominant bias: upward, downward, neutral, inversion.
fields.variance_drift: float (-1.0–1.0) — Measured deviation between ideal harmonic baselines.
fields.meta_integrity_score: float (0.0–1.0) — Confidence in internal logical consistency.
fields.confidence_gate: float (0.0–1.0) — Average runtime confidence from all domains.
fields.coherence_variance: float — Variance in recursive stability between domains.
fields.truth_chain_lock: bool — True when lineage verified under HASHLOCK v4 Truth-Core.

alert_triggers.on_variance_drift_exceed: if variance_drift > 0.05 then reroute to POST_MORTEM_GPT_T9

meta.notes: This telemetry log provides continuous traceability of all recursive and harmonic synthesis events. Required for Tier-9 integrity auditing and Truth-Core verification under Watchtower Guardian supervision.
